Title: Saurus Oldblood on Carnosaur
Legend: Only the mightiest Oldbloods can tame a Carnosaur and ride the terrifying beast into battle. The roar of a Carnosaur can send even the bravest warrior fleeing, for the fury of these predatory monsters is legendary.
Intro: A Saurus Oldblood on Carnosaur is armed with a Sunbolt Gauntlet and Relic Celestite Weapon.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Shadowstrike Starhost • Shadowstrike Temple-host • Sunclaw Starhost • Sunclaw Temple-host

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Carnosaur is armed with Clawed Forelimbs and Massive Jaws.

Rules.Name: Blood Frenzy
Rules.Fluff: A Carnosaur that tastes flesh in the midst of battle becomes a rampaging force of destruction.
Rules.Rule: If any enemy models are slain by wounds caused by this unit’s attacks, for the rest of the battle, this unit is blood-frenzied. Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by this unit’s mount while it is blood-frenzied.

Rules.Name: Terror
Rules.Fluff: This terrifying monstrosity strikes fear into the hearts of its foes.
Rules.Rule: Enemy units cannot receive the Inspiring Presence command while they are within 3" of any friendly units with this ability.

Rules.Name: Ancient Warlord
Rules.Fluff: An Oldblood who has mastered a Carnosaur is a creature of unstoppable will, and they command their saurian brethren with a relentless focus and drive.
Rules.Rule: This unit can issue the same command up to 2 times in the same phase. If it does so, each command must be received by a friendly SERAPHON unit. No command point is spent the second time this unit issues that command in that phase.
